website_summaries.verdict: This well-made bucket dolly can be adjusted to fit buckets of a variety of sizes and can hold a lot of weight.
pros: Casters allow the bucket dolly to rotate easily in a full circle
cons: The casters on this bucket have a tendency to fall off if you lift the bucket to move it

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to move my wash bucket around without having to pick it up and slosh water all over my feet....... However the one I received was NOT the same as the one depicted on Amazon. I had to put silicon on the plastic screws to make it easier to turn. Had to use crescent wrench to loosen them up and could not advance screws without silicon. It appears to be a lower quality version of one in picture. Amazon needs to update pic and not be accused of "bait and switch". BUYER BEWARE !!!
customer_reviews.author: Psquared

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution.
customer_reviews.text: I make small batch soap. 50 lbs of coconut oil in a pail is horrible on the back and the evil handle on the pail hurts my hand. This marvelous caddy turns my oil pail into a little wagon so I can pull it from the closet to the kitchen and never have to lift!!!! After the first use I started thinking of all the possible uses for this wonderful purchase. Best ever mop bucket. Cleaning bucket on wheels. Craft supply wagon. Dog food container on wheels. It goes on and on! And if the pail dies, you get to keep the wheels for the next one - there are zero reasons not to love this caddy.
customer_reviews.author: SeldomIsHeard

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my dust catcher 5gal bucket. To keep it on the ground when in use and keep it mobile. This does work nice and sturdy the the reason I took off one star is because the plastic tightening screws are a waist maybe if it had one more instead of the 3. But every time I try to tighten the bucket from moving it pushes it up. The screws do not hold the bucket securely if it’s empty I have to keep pushing it down to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: JarHead002

customer_reviews.title: Nice wash bucket dolly
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the wheels were very easy to but on, the plastic screws in the side not so much, hard to get started and the holes were full of plastic shavings which will really help if you clean them out first. The plastic screws still are difficult to start even after cleaning the holes, (note the wholes are also in plastic.), the product sits level and rolls easy was a good purchase, i would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. White

customer_reviews.title: Great for carboys if that's your thing
customer_reviews.text: I'm a homebrewer and still make use of 6.5g glass carboys (which are both heavy and fragile). I was looking for something to move the filled carboys, which might weigh around 60#, from my brew area to garage without breaking my back. It's nervous carrying six-gallons of fresh wort in a glass jug across twenty-feet of concrete but this dolly makes it a breeze. I place the empty carboy in the dolly before filling, it rolls smoothly, and I can lock it in place while moving the carboy in to the fermentation chamber. Solidly built, had none of the issues with missing parts others had described, my back and nerves are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph McCall

customer_reviews.title: it is not easy to overturn and will last a very long time
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty container for 5 gallon buckets, it is not easy to overturn and will last a very long time. I had trouble with the bucket slipping out of the cart when I would lift up on the bucket handle. I solved this problem by attaching a rubber stretcher (for holding down things) at the bottom. This solved my problem and I can move this whole assembly where I need it. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I also got the plate which connects two of these together. Makes it so easy to move-around buckets full of water. My driveway is on a slight incline, so I have to use the locks on the caster. They're a bit of a pain on the 2" wheels, but work well enough to keep it from sliding down the driveway. The plastic screws are fine. I don't know why people complain about these screws. They spin easily enough and apply enough pressure to the bucket to keep it from tipping when you use it or move it. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. EARLS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic dolly
customer_reviews.text: fantastic 5 gallon bucket dolly. I bought 2 of them and attached them together for washing and rinsing my washing mitts. Couldn't be happier with these. Chemical Guys makes an excellent product and it's designed very well. Will last for years. I own a exotic car detailing company and these are wonderful. Would HIGHLY recommend these to anyone that needs to constantly move buckets around. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed they do not match with my set
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize the wheels are smaller then the other grit gaurd dollys I've purchased. Disappointed they do not match with my set.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I have bought around 10 and will continue buying!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I am a supervisor to seven restaurants and continue to spend the money on these because they last! We put our towel buckets on them and they are superb. The wheels are now 20-months old and still work really well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: B. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Barely acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with scratches and scuffs. May have been used and returned? The threads on the dolly for the three screws are poorly machined. Essentially they are pre-stripped because of the sloppy manufacturing, making it very difficult to turn the screws. The product touts that it is “Made in the USA” but that doesn’t mean much if the quality is low. Frankly, it might as well have been made overseas -the quality probably wouldn’t be much worse and maybe it would have been priced more reasonably!
customer_reviews.author: BluesWest

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to move bucket around while washing/detailing my car or what ever else you might neec
customer_reviews.text: Having a mobile car washing bucket that I don't have to carry is awesome. The only thing I dislike is how you attach the bucket in the holder with the big plastic screws you have to tighten enough that it indents the bucket in 3 spots and I gave a screen in the bottom of my bucket to keep the dirt in water at the bottom of bucket and off my car washing Mitt. It still works but can tighten as much as I wish because it conflicts with where the screen sits.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan

customer_reviews.title: It works great, but...
customer_reviews.text: ...don't think your gonna just grab the handle, pick it up and go. The wheel base falls off and you are left holding the bucket! The wing nuts push into the bucket and make indents that look like they are going to crack. I have the base along with the Chemical Guys bucket that has the lid. The bucket and lid is a great feature. With the dirt screen, you can just put the lid on and store with the left over water to use again. All in all, the total unit is great.
customer_reviews.author: tx77318

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and stable
customer_reviews.text: This wheeled base for large paint buckets is made from sturdy plastic with high quality casters. The bucket fits into it with room to spare around the sides, but it comes with adjustment screws to firm up the bucket in it. The only thing about it that cost it stars in value for money is I think it's way too expensive for what it is, but without equal alternatives, you pay what you have to if you want it. Overall, it's works very well for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dobrynin

customer_reviews.title: A little overkill!
customer_reviews.text: This little rolling caddy is a little overpriced! I was having trouble finding this style of rolling caddy for my wash bucket at the time I bought this. After purchasing this, I found one like this a Walmart for about HALF the price and was made very durable too. I mean, How durable does one of these things have to be anyways?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Well weighted base unit - cheep bolts -not really worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The bolts are not solid ( had one brake in the first month)( the seller send 4 replacement bolts) you "can't" lift the bucket and base together to lift it over a hose. The unit has some weight and wheels so it rolls well when I use it as a seat/ creeper to do low work. :O)
customer_reviews.author: Susanne M. Draper

customer_reviews.title: Great for washing the car.
customer_reviews.text: The wheels snapped into place very easily. It comes with two wheels that have brakes in case you don't want it rolling away on you. Like other reviews have explained as well as the instructions. Be very careful when threading the plastic knobs in as you can strip them very easily. They are not intended to hold the bucket in when being picked up, rather than keep it snug when wheeling around.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID VIPOND

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy duty, don't be off put by plastic screws
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a rock solid. A good example of a durable plastic product. Some have pointed out that the screws used to be metal and are now plastic, I don't consider that a problem. The screws had a very nice, tight fit in the threads with no play. They also don't have any risk of rusting, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I very recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: My husband doesn’t like to write reviews but I need to give a credit to this amazing product because it has helped my husband tremendously! He started developing a pain on his knees due to his job (electrician) when he needs to work on lower outlets, etc. Strong material and never fails
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use with Dust Deputy shop dust control device.
customer_reviews.text: Using this bucket dolly with my shop dust-control device. The 5 casters and perfect fit has solved a big problem for me. The dolly is heavy enough to remain very stable when in use. It rolls very smoothly and is made with very good materials and workmanship. Here is the ASIN for the Dust Deputy that required a better rolling solution: B002GZLCHM
customer_reviews.author: Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome way to wash your car!!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn through a number of 5 gallon bucket bottoms sliding them around on my asphalt driveway. I decided to give this holder a try and I am quite pleased. It moves effortlessly and is of high quality. The rubber wheels look like they will be with me for many washes.
customer_reviews.author: whitejww

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Rolls great and makes moving these 5 gallon buckets around SOOOO much easier. Only complaint is that the screw holes for the holding screws aren’t cut clean enough and some are hard to screw in. No biggie but just takes longer.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy roll and control
customer_reviews.text: Use this with a box store bucket for washing my cars. Wish I’d bought this a long time ago, makes washing that much easier. Also bought a lid and store my cleaning supplies it. Rolls very easy and goes where you want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: On the fence
customer_reviews.text: Maybe if I had a bucket that was bit stiff, this would be a better device. That being said, when you screw the holders in place to pin the bucket, they really don't do anything. I can pull it right out using Chemical guys buckets. They roll quite well and the quality of wheels, plastic frame is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Bucket Mover
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best thing ever for moving buckets around. The castors roll perfectly and the screws work well securing the bucket to the cart. Highly recommended and useful for moving buckets of ice. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lieberum

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it is worth the money, but it is definitely well built. No issues with the dolly. Definitely makes hand washing easier. Probably not worth it for the casual car washer. For us we hand wash the vehicles about twice a month. The dolly adds a nice touch, especially while washing the wheels and the rocker panels.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy maneuvering of wash bucket.
customer_reviews.text: I have needed this for years. We have 4 cars and I wash them all. The bucket really helps out. I use a soft bristle brush on a telescoping pole and the bucket easily rolls along while washing the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: DesertRider

customer_reviews.title: The best find ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest product I’ve ever used for hauling 5 gallon buckets of wheat, flour and sugar around. Ive baked a lot of whole wheat, white bread, cookies and cake. This is the only way to go. These products filled with wheat, flour and sugar last years without any problems. The wheels are the only way to roll from pantry or laundry room to the kitchen and back.
customer_reviews.author: Templeladee

customer_reviews.title: Using this as a base for my small pancake air compressor
customer_reviews.text: Thinking outside the box, I ordered this to make my small pancake air compressor more convenient to move around. It works perfectly for that purpose. It is a very solid product and I'm sure it would also work well for its intended purpose. The wheels snap into place easily. I am not using the screws intended to hold the bucket in place, but they look serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second time purchasing this.Works great for my husbands line of work. He is a tile installer. Bucket doesn’t tip over its very balanced and wheels are good too. Will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Oli

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money unless u just need it to sit there
customer_reviews.text: Way to wide for the buckets they have (or any other 5 gallon buckets ) to keep them held in with the adjustment screws you have to tighten it so hard that it cracks the bucket!!!! And even then if you lift it by the bucket it will fall iff
customer_reviews.author: Evodave

customer_reviews.title: Makes using my buckets so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of these for use on a variety of 5-gallon buckets--ice melt, birdseed, etc. These roll extremely easily and make working around the yard so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Dachshund Diva

customer_reviews.title: Good otem
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I'm using it for a propane tank. I'm disabled, and this is to move the tank around. The tank doesn't sit right down inside, but it's enough to hold it,with a bungee cord over it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Starman

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for most homes.
customer_reviews.text: Received mine yesterday and I'm pleased. Screws are plastic, yes. Emblem is missing, yes. No sticker in bag of rollers either. None of that bothered me, as I'm just going to be using it to roll my soapy bucket around washing cars. No CG advertisement and, imo, no need to dig into my bucket with metal screws to secure my bucket. Quality rollers and design without being overly heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: MikeF

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, needs slight modifications
customer_reviews.text: Great overall idea but, a bit pricey for what it is. It also does not like staying on the bucket when you lift the bucket to move it over hoses and such. Needs some type of a friction pad on the knobs to keep it from slipping off the bucket. Plastic on plastic, then add in soapy water, not a good combo.
customer_reviews.author: cliff

customer_reviews.title: You guys are awesome. I love to find ways to make a ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making a high quality bucket dolly! You guys are awesome.I love to find ways to make a product better but I can't seem to find anything wrong with your dolly. It works extremely well. The urethane wheels are soft and do not damage floors which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: What a relief to my back!
customer_reviews.text: This rolls perfectly. Highly recommend. Only tip - pay attention to the wheels when assembling as two of them are locking. I accidentally put my locking wheels next to each other. ;)
customer_reviews.author: dontbeugly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for washing my car
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for washing my car. No need to keep picking up the water bucket while moving around the car. I have two of them and they make washing my car less strenuous. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Nice little roller.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little addition to the shop. Easily rolls on concrete. A metal framed rolling seat may hold up longer though but so far this one works well.
customer_reviews.author: MDJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality Desgin and Materials Make for a SOLID Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used a 5-gallon bucket for weekly car washing and this accessory is a MUST! I purchased it under a Daily Deal sale and it made it an even better purchase! I wish I would have known about this product sooner as I would have bought it years ago! No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: bkbobo

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that the plastic twist knobs did NOT hold the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the plastic twist knobs did NOT hold the bucket when lifted to carry around. There should be a way to stop it from rolling down the drive way.
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very strong. Buckets dont hold well with plastic screws tightening against plastic smooth bucket so roll it around, dont lift it by the bucket it can come out of roller carrier. This is a high quality roller system.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana F

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty plastic and quality wheels
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty plastic molded item. Should last for years to come. The wheels are not cheap. Saved about $25 bucks compared to other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Trump 2020/MAGA

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something like this in my field of work "Detail Tech Ford Dealership" it makes going around the vehicles much easier than dragging or carrying the bucket. Personally, I feel it helps to conserve your own energy.
customer_reviews.author: JeffM252

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’5” 250lbs this is my shop stool/ organizer. I have a bucket with the pockets around the outside and a parts lid that is also my seat. Been using this aggressively for a few month now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: My vacuum uses this one up stairs. Maybe designed for paint bucket. It does well in Shop Vacuum with or with water too.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable!!!
customer_reviews.text: This dolly is heavy duty and makes taking my 5 gallon buckets of fish tank water outside soooo much easier!!!
customer_reviews.author: hoovj

customer_reviews.title: I can push the mop and watered-filled bucket easily up and over carpeting to get in and out ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hoping for. I ordered The Chemical Guy heavy duty bucket and Cyclone dirt trapper to fit into this dolly. Now when I mop my floors at home, I can push the mop and watered-filled bucket easily up and over carpeting to get in and out of rooms that need cleaning. It is so well made. The fiver caster wheels slide with no effort at all. Bravo Chemical Guy!!
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: I experienced very few problems like other posts
customer_reviews.text: I experienced very few problems like other posts. Large plastic bolts fit threaded holes perfectly. The wheels are high quality.The only thing I noticed is you have to screw down the bolts a lot before they hold onto the bucket. Maybe a bolt over each leg rather than just 3 may have worked better. The system including the bucket etc, is just what I needed. It arrived right on time, hard to believe they deliver on Sundays....GT in AZ
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Taylor

customer_reviews.title: its worth it
customer_reviews.text: Being a handy guy i was actually going to make something like this myself for my car wash bucket...after pricing the wheels alone its just not worth the time. Just buy this. This is nearly indestructible as well. Do yourself a favor and drill several holes in the base as the bottom will fill with water if you dont.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hill

customer_reviews.title: The wheels are very good quality, very smooth
customer_reviews.text: No worries about the "plastic bolts"... they are stout enough if you break them, It's your own fault.. The wheels are very good quality, very smooth. It may be a tad pricey, but if you can't treat yourself once in a while.... give up... :)
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, very useful
customer_reviews.text: Price seems a little high, but the quality is superb, so you definitely get what you pay for. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Vance A. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Fits standard 5 gallon buckets perfectly. Easy to roll. I have tools inside and in caddy's on the outside of buckets. This dolly handles the weight easily.
customer_reviews.author: BW8

customer_reviews.title: ... last 20 years that I have not had this awesome and inexpensive rolling bucket holder
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe for the last 20 years that I have not had this awesome and inexpensive rolling bucket holder. I own an aquarium service and have been so inconvenienced dragging buckets of water or marine salt. My back is saved thanks to this product. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Rolls very well.
customer_reviews.text: Rolls well on rough concrete. Probably could strip the three plastic bolts that secures the bucket if you over did it.
customer_reviews.author: Mentalic.

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who do 2 bucket wash with 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for those who do 2 bucket wash with 5 gallon buckets (buy the plate to connect them) and buy a third for your wheel bucket. Easy to move even across driveway pavers, (This is a Grit Guard bucket dolly).
customer_reviews.author: Rich R.

customer_reviews.title: If you like well built you'll like this
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper alternatives but if you can afford the extra cost I recommend this. It will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Asiago

customer_reviews.title: The Plastic screws that hold the buck could have been better design you cant pick up the bucket without dolly ...
customer_reviews.text: Well build high quality construction. The Plastic screws that hold the buck could have been better design you cant pick up the bucket without dolly falling off.
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: Tough Bucket Transport
customer_reviews.text: Bucket dolly works very well. Tough, durable and reliable thru any terrain. Rolls safely and is easy to push or pull along. Clamps on to any five gallon bucket for secure transport. Happy with this product ! Rick
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easy
customer_reviews.text: Great for washing my car . Love this product. Holds bucket well . Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Comfort feature
customer_reviews.text: I geared up over the summer, so I could more easily wash my car. This dolly keeps my back happy. Not having to pick up the bucket every time I move, yeas! I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: gEoFFTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I got tired of lugging around my tools in my 5 gallon buckets
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of hauling around my tools that I have loaded in my 5 gallon bucket organizers. These Bucket Dollys are a perfect solution for me to move things around quickly, especially when I am cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Strong. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong. Exactly what I needed. I use them for 5 gallon jugs of water because they are required to be off the floor when stored at my company.
customer_reviews.author: Product Tester

customer_reviews.title: Roll Out the Bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Get this item to got with the Chemical Guys bucket which is built to really last. I love this for going along the lower runner boards. I usually wash two cars side-by-side so I don't need to be messing around. This is the right tool for the right job. That is how my wife describes me.
customer_reviews.author: normco

customer_reviews.title: Durable and strong
customer_reviews.text: Initial look and feel excellent. Seems very durable, but time will tell. Can easily sit on lid of bucket and roll around vehicle. Combined with Bucket Boss to hold washing and detailing supplies. Will save my back.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Allen

customer_reviews.title: Well made - holds my dust deputy
customer_reviews.text: I first thought the price was a little high for what it is until I opened the package. Solid construction with well made casters. The plastic screws are pretty big and seem to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: MJW

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and practical! Wheely it is!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful product for making 5 gallon buckets wheel-able. I use it for my tool bucket in my garage. Fabulous and practical!
customer_reviews.author: William Russo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a seat to clean wheels and to work on anything.
customer_reviews.author: R Oller

customer_reviews.title: Holds 5 gal bucket
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 5 gallon bucket perfectly. Easily holds the cyclone bucket of my vacuum for easy maneuverability.
customer_reviews.author: David Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Very good tool for painting and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I on painting company and we use this everyday. I just wish it was cheaper to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Tosi

customer_reviews.title: rolls well. only issue is you have to crank ...
customer_reviews.text: rolls well. only issue is you have to crank down on the lock screws and compress the bucket slightly in order that you can pick it up as one unit.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great for detailing car. Use with Chemical Guys buckets for best fit. Much cheaper way than mechanics chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Does what designed for.
customer_reviews.text: Easily slides heavy bucket with water in it on wheels.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Especially nice to work on
customer_reviews.text: Makes the wash bucket a handy seat that you can move around while washing and waxing. Especially nice to work on wheels
customer_reviews.author: Loghead

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the greatest things I’ve ever bought. It allows me to do all my finish work in residential homes, and just scoot whenever I feel like.
customer_reviews.author: Talbert Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great dolly, speeds washing any vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. This thing is sturdy and will outlast me. Low center of gravity prevents tipping and it holds multiple sizes of buckets. The fasteners keep everything secure.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for when laying tile, grouting or washing your truck
customer_reviews.author: Aguy24

customer_reviews.title: Very well built.
customer_reviews.text: EZ to move around 5 gallon bucket of gear lube for outboard motors. Used daily commercially. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble and it securely holds my 50 lb ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, stable, easy to assemble and it securely holds my 50 lb bucket of soap making oil. A game changer for me and my relationship with those 50 lb buckets.
customer_reviews.author: deanywalker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy well made product. No more back breaking lifting of 5 gallon buckets.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Mounting
customer_reviews.text: Make sure that the bucket is centered on these wheels before tightening the mounting screws.
customer_reviews.author: Nautor65

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Rolls nicely. Going to put rubber caps on the screws that hold the bucket so they grip the bucket better but a great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: David Harding

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like bucket fits into it rolls easily 5 gallon bucket only
customer_reviews.author: Big_jissum

customer_reviews.title: Wheels locks not working
customer_reviews.text: The wheel locks stopped working the second time of use.
customer_reviews.author: Hafiz Bacchus

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If one caster goes bad ( Peels off ) no parts available. Need to purchase a new one.Disposable???
customer_reviews.author: JJM

customer_reviews.title: Thumps up
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected! Love it! Will use it with my 7 gallon and 5 gallon buckets. Pictures show dolly with the 7 gallon bucket.
customer_reviews.author: mayonnaise

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Great Bucket Dolly.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my car wash bucket kits perfect. I put my lids on the buckets and use them to polish/wax the lower half of my truck. I weight 277 pounds and they don't even complain and roll great!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Guy

customer_reviews.title: Makes washing your car fun again.
customer_reviews.text: These silly simple holders make washing your car a whole lot more fun. They are a must have if you are going to do the two bucket wash system which needs a lot of water and you need to move those heavy buckets all around the car. I have a sloped driveway so the wheel locks help for that very well.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: quality product, works well with my 5 gallon bucket
customer_reviews.text: we use it with a plain white 5 gallon bucket for a garbage pail. My son can easily push it around the house to scoop the various litter boxes. Then, it can be wheeled in the kitchen to receive kitchen garbage. Only complaint: They need to make it in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Can't think of any features it should have that it doesn't have
customer_reviews.text: This dolly assembles easily and seems to be very durable. It's certainly made my car washing process more convenient. It will fit a standard 3 1/2 or 5 gallon bucket. The wheels roll smoothly and there's a wheel lock to keep it in place when desired.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this years ago when I first ...
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this years ago when I first saw this? I use it as a "scoot around" seat more than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Mnkyprod

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product. Lousy plastic screws. Two of the three plastic screws were defective/malformed on the threads upon receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Don from 92595

customer_reviews.title: ... father who enjoys detailing his cars but has a bad back. This is a real life saver to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father who enjoys detailing his cars but has a bad back. This is a real life saver to eliminate lugging the water bucket around the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket dolly.
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Casters work well. Mine spent the winter outside in my yard and never got rusty.
customer_reviews.author: ScottB

customer_reviews.title: Great for making car washing easier
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, makes washing my cars easier, however, does fall off of the bucket when you pick up the bucket, even if you have the 3 thumb screws tighted down snugly
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Dust Deputy
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy assembly and reasonably priced. Bought to make my Oneida Dust Deputy stable and mobile. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tenn Jazz Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great dont gottaa drag my wash bucket around anymore

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a detail shop and these things kick some butt!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Green

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and performance. I would buy again. Easy to use and assembly is quick and painless.
customer_reviews.author: Jpz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the bucket to go with it. My hubby likes it - he washed our vehicles and loves the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

product_meta.title: Chemical Guys ACC_100.1 Professional Bucket Dolly
product_meta.description: Style:1 Wheel LockThe Professional Bucket Dolly is a quick and easy way to take your wash bucket on the move. This heavy duty bucket dolly is constructed of durable plastic with professional quality rolling caster to handle any detailing challenge. Save your energy by rolling your bucket around rather than carrying it around as you wash and clean. This bucket dolly can fit 3.5 to 7 gallon buckets and can support up to 300 pounds. It even doubles as a detailer creeper so you can keep your knees off the ground and work in a comfortable position. This bucket dolly has 360 degree turning capability, so you can have unlimited control and maneuverability. The bucket dolly also helps you stay organized by holding your detailing brushes, towels and cleaners so you can roll them around wherever you go. Also, the bucket dolly has locking casters that will prevent the dolly from rolling away so you can stay in complete control of your equipment.
